revised_title: Investigations on Magnesium and its Reactions with Various Substances
tldr: The author, Dr. T. L. Phipson, examines the properties and reactions of magnesium with various substances, including silicic acid, boracic acid, and carbonic acid. He also discusses the formation of magnesium alloys and their potential uses, as well as magnesium's ability to precipitate other metals from their neutral solutions.
